# Construct Essence (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[Warforged (Domain)|Warforged 5]] [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living construct touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 183

As *[[Construct Essence, Lesser (Spell)|lesser construct essence]]* with the following additional effects. The living construct becomes immune to critical hits, sneak attacks, ability damage, ability drain, death effects, and necromancy effects. The living construct also gains darkvision out to 60 feet.

This spell counters and dispels *[[Humanoid Essence, Lesser (Spell)|lesser humanoid essence]]* and *[[Humanoid Essence (Spell)|humanoid essence]]*. If this spell is cast on a creature under the effect of *[[Humanoid Essence, Lesser (Spell)|lesser humanoid essence]]*, the latter spell is automatically ended. If this spell is cast on a creature under the effect of *[[Humanoid Essence (Spell)|humanoid essence]]*, both spells are dispelled and have no effect. It has no effect if cast on a creature under the effect of *[[Humanoid Essence, Greater (Spell)|greater humanoid essence]]*.
